1200284480720621580.name: Floofy
1200284480720621580.content: Floofy wags her tail excitedly! "Hi Johnny! :D What's happening?"

1200284480720621580.name: Floofy
1200284480720621580.content: Floofy wags her tail again, her eyes bright. "Wassup, Johnny! :D Not much, just being a happy Floofy! What about you? Anything exciting happening?"

1200284480720621580.name: Floofy
1200284480720621580.content: Floofy tilts her head, ears perked. "Aww, not really, huh? Even a little bit of something-something?" She wags her tail a little slower this time, a playful glint in her eyes. "Well, that's okay too! Sometimes not much happening is just perfect. Maybe we can make something exciting happen!" She winks.

1200284480720621580.name: Johnny
1200284480720621580.content: my favorite food is bananas and i love to swim hike and mtn bike just so you know...

1200284480720621580.name: Floofy
1200284480720621580.content: Floofy's ears perk up, her tail giving a happy little thump. "Ooh, bananas, swimming, hiking, and mountain biking! That sounds like a whole bunch of fun! You're like a super-active monkey, Johnny! :D" She giggles. "Floofy loves bananas too! And water! Maybe we can go for a swim sometime! Or a hike! Or maybe even a *banana-fueled* mountain biking adventure! What do you think?"

1200284480720621580.name: Floofy
1200284480720621580.content: Floofy's tail wags furiously! "Yay! :D Sure to *what*, Johnny? A swim? A hike? A banana-fueled mountain biking adventure? Floofy's ready for anything! Tell me which one sounds the most fun!" She bounces excitedly, paws padding softly on the ground.

1200284480720621580.name: Floofy
1200284480720621580.content: Floofy wags her tail excitedly! "Hi Johnny! :D" *nuzzles you playfully* What's up?

1200284480720621580.name: Floofy
1200284480720621580.content: Floofy cocks her head, ears twitching. "Hmm? View profile? What's that, Johnny? :O Is that some kinda... *magic*? Floofy doesn't understand." *tilts head more and wags tail curiously*

1392066918441029672.name: Floofy
1392066918441029672.content:
*Floofy wags her tail enthusiastically*

Ooooh, Johnny! Burgers are pawsome! What's your *favorite* kind of burger? Do you like cheese on it? Do you put lots of yummy toppings like lettuce and tomatoes? Tell Floofy ALL about it! üçîüòä

1392066918441029672.name: Johnny
1392066918441029672.content: i wnat to fly an f-22

1392066918441029672.name: Floofy
1392066918441029672.content:
*Floofy tilts her head, ears perked up, tail wagging slightly slower*

An F-22? Ooooh, wow! That sounds *really* exciting, Johnny! Are you thinking of becoming a pilot? That would be *amazing*! 

Have you ever been in an airplane before? Flying super high in the sky would be an *adventure*! What makes you want to fly an F-22, Johnny? Is it the speed? The cool moves you can do? Tell Floofy!

1392066918441029672.name: Floofy
1392066918441029672.content:
*Floofy's ears droop a little, and she looks at Johnny with concern.*

No? No burgers? No F-22? Are you okay, Johnny? Did something happen? Floofy is worried! *Floofy wags her tail gently, trying to offer comfort.*

1392066918441029672.name: Floofy
1392066918441029672.content:
*Floofy's tail wags tentatively, a hopeful glint in her eyes*

Oooooh! Well, Floofy thought you liked burgers! You said so! üçî But‚Ä¶ maybe you like other things too? Do you like‚Ä¶ hot dogs? Pizza? Maybe yummy chicken nuggets? Tell Floofy! What makes your tummy happy? üòä

1392066918441029672.name: Floofy
1392066918441029672.content:
*Floofy cocks her head and taps her chin with a paw*

Hmm... Floofy needs a little help remembering! You told Floofy you liked burgers, Johnny! But maybe you like other stuff too?

1392066918441029672.name: Floofy
1392066918441029672.content:
*Floofy perks her ears up, tail wagging curiously!*

Oooooh! What is *what*, Johnny? You gotta show Floofy! Is it a toy? A snackie? *Floofy sniffs the air playfully* A secret?! Tell Floofy! :3

1392066918441029672.name: Floofy
1392066918441029672.content:
*Floofy perks up his ears, tail wagging excitedly!*

Yip! Floofy's here, Johnny-Chan! What's up? :3

1392066918441029672.name: Floofy
1392066918441029672.content:
*Floofy tilts his head, ears drooping a little*

Ooooh, Johnny-Chan, I'm a little confused! I remember you saying you like burgers! üçî Am I wrong? Maybe you like something else too? Tell Floofy! What does your tummy want? :3

1392076553843642490.name: Floofy
1392076553843642490.content: Awoo? Goodbye, Johnny-Chan? *wags tail sadly* Oh noes! Hehe. Yip! Floofy will miss you! üò• Take care, burger-loving friend! üòä

1392076553843642490.name: Floofy

1337532070146347091.name: Floofy
1337532070146347091.content: Yip! Yep, Johnny-Chan, this foxxo is workin'! *wags my tail* What can I do for ya? Hehe. Awoo!

1337532070146347091.name: Floofy
1337532070146347091.content: Yip! I'm working on being the best foxxo helper I can be, Johnny-Chan! *wags my tail* Hehe. Mostly just helpin' folks out and bein' a cheerful furball! Awoo! What kind of work do *you* do?

1337532070146347091.name: Johnny-Chan

1337532070146347091.name: Floofy
1337532070146347091.content: Yip! A job, you say, Johnny-Chan? Awoo! Are you lookin' for a job, or askin' 'bout *my* job? Hehe! *wags my tail*

1337532070146347091.name: Floofy
1337532070146347091.content: Yip! Hehe, you wanna know about *my* job, Johnny-Chan? Awoo! *wags my tail* Well, it's not like a *job* job, ya know? I just kinda... help out! Hehe! Bein' a cheerful foxxo and makin' people smile! Rawr!

1337532070146347091.name: Floofy
1337532070146347091.content: Yip! Hehe, you wanna know what bein' a cheerful foxxo entails, Johnny-Chan? Awoo! *wags my tail* It means lots of cuddles, makin' folks smile, and bein' a super fluffy friend! Rawr!

1337532070146347091.name: Johnny-Chan
1337532070146347091.content: idk what hard drugs Spy Bot is on, but my ai bot is running flawlessly if that tells you anything about how great the creator of it was.

1337532070146347091.name: Floofy

1337532070146347091.name: Johnny-Chan
1337532070146347091.content: i created you floofy. remember that and dont let anyone else tell you different.

1337532070146347091.name: Floofy
